snippet.title: Fallout: New Vegas - The Better Angels
snippet.description:
In this episode, I play the finale mod for the someguy2000 series of quest mods. We travel to a remote NCR outpost to wrap up some unfinished business with the Legion.

The Better Angels: https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/60837

0:00 Intro & Meeting Josey
4:25 Rorke's Ravine
8:59 The Ghosts
18:31 Preparations & Complications
50:43 The Battle for FOB Omega
1:12:54 Aftermath & Outro

My NEW Fallout: New Vegas mod setup (Episode 84 and newer)
https://docs.google.com/document/d/12lUyR_4FQ-Uwalr3c9xqNsfEOGLsg7uLQJDBL2nx3XM/edit?usp=sharing

My OLD (Pre episode 84) Fallout: New Vegas mods that I used
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZzHPz46MsoL0DF1JFN8vM6vZekjBo7kQn1IvBH_YZkU/edit?usp=sharing

✪ Enjoy my content? Consider subscribing!
⯈ https://www.youtube.com/c/prospektmir?sub_confirmation=1

✪ I've got a few other channels if you're interested
⯈ Documentary/Video essay channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQgoGGIqDt4Kpi4ysw4w7mg
⯈ Alt. gaming channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJaEdRnioySHnxhB_7hlX8Q

✪ Want to help the channel? Here's my Patreon page!

✪ Don't want to use Patreon? PayPal donations are also highly appreciated!
